messages.message:
:wave::skin-tone-3:  Hi Team - we're getting word that a lot of the big/medium sized tech companies are rescinding intern offers (:cry:) so we know there are a lot of really talented people abruptly looking for internships. We're willing/open to bring on engineering interns for the Summer so it'd be great for folks to post to Twitter and LinkedIn or your social media platform of choice that we're looking! Thanks!

https://techcrunch.com/2020/04/17/airbnb-lays-off-contractors-and-cancels-summer-internships/
